data.title: Atlanta Comedy Theater
data.meta_description: Comedy Club in Underground Atlanta bringing the BEST Live Standup Comedy, Improv, Dinner Theater, STAND-UP COMEDY & DRAG SHOWS with live ENTERTAINMENT & COMEDY
data.text:
Make it a Date Night, Roll in Solo, or enjoy a Casual Night Out with co-workers and friends.

We are the ACT: a Full Bar/Restaurant with a Live Comedy Stage bringing the HOTTEST names in comedy… Dave Chappelle, Louie CK, Matt Rife, Eddie Griffin, Chris Tucker, Andrew Schultz, Bruce Bruce, Kenan Thompson, Sommore, Cedric the Entertainer, DL Hughley, Tommy Davidson, Arsenio Hall, Gary Owen, Ricky Smiley, Randy Rainbow, Luenell, Kountry Wayne, Jess Hilarious and so many more of the brightest stars seen on HBO, Netflix, BET, Showtime, Comedy Central and more.

Come to our shows, you won’t be disappointed - live, love, LAUGH!

Dine with us and have a Night of Laughter at a Intimate Stand-Up Comedy Club

Please Dress to Impress for a Fun night of Comedy.

You must be 21 Years of Age with proper ID.

2 ITEM MINIMUM PER PERSON OR $15 SURCHARGE AT YOUR TABLE.

Comics Subject to Change without Notice.

Tickets are NON-TRANSFERABLE and must show ID at the Box Office to Claim.

PLEASE DO NOT BUY TICKETS FROM A THIRD PARTY SUCH AS VIVIDSEATS.COM, EVENTTICKETS.COM,

OR ANY OTHER 3RD PARTY. WE WILL NOT HONOR THEM.

PLEASE ONLY BUY FROM OUR WEBSITE OR SHOWCLIX.COM

Please arrive 45 min prior to showtime.

Make sure you're here early for a photoshoot at our STEP & REPEAT Banners

JOIN OUR TEXT CLUB TEXT THE KEYWORD

"ATLCOMEDY"

TO 7707246400
